text: Sándor Kugler (1879 - 11 November 1964) was a Hungarian swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Hungarian male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Hungary Category:Swimmers at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Sándor Kugler
